policies.qual:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM users
  WHERE ((users.id = auth.uid()) AND (users.role = 'grand_master'::text))))

(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM users
  WHERE ((users.id = auth.uid()) AND (users.role = ANY (ARRAY['grand_master'::text, 'master'::text])))))

((email = (( SELECT users.email
   FROM auth.users
  WHERE (users.id = auth.uid())))::text) OR (assigned_to = auth.uid()))
((resume_token IS NOT NULL) AND (resume_token_expires_at > timezone('utc'::text, now())))

(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM users
  WHERE ((users.id = auth.uid()) AND (users.role = 'grand_master'::text))))

(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM users
  WHERE ((users.id = auth.uid()) AND (users.role = ANY (ARRAY['grand_master'::text, 'master'::text])))))

(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM users
  WHERE ((users.id = auth.uid()) AND (users.role = ANY (ARRAY['grand_master'::text, 'master'::text])))))
